document_data.name: Thulser's Lodge
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite web/Candlekeep forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2013)/Elderly & Retirement}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Thulser's Lodge''' was a residence in [[Cormyr]] that housed [[Purple Dragons|Purple]] and [[Blue Dragons]] who were forced into retirement by disease.
document_data.Geography: The Lodge lay in the [[King's Forest]] a short distance east of [[Mouth o' Gargoyles]] on [[Starwater Road]].
